Dig Dig Boom

Dig Dig Boom is a roguelike mining game where time only move when you do. The world consists of various tiles that all have different interactions with each other or the player's tools. It's up to the player to figure out how to best exploit these interactions to become a skilled dynaminer in search of treasures.

Time only moves when you do

Dig Dig Boom is "turn based" in the classical Roguelike sense: Every time you move or perform any action, the world "ticks forwards" one step, both enemy creatures and physics elements like falling boulders and spreading fire.

Layers of interactions

Almost all tiles in the procedurally generated caves have some unique interaction with something else. Once you figure out these tricks, you can strategize new mining techniques! 

Combine unique mining tools

Dozens of mining tools, each with potential upgrades and combinations bring a rich variety to your possible approaches to dealing with the mines. Use the crossbow bolts to climb. Use the ladder to bomb the ceiling. Use the fireworks to stun the enemies so you can smack them with a sledgehammer!
